Please seed im stuck at 99.8% :(

I actually bought SS II, but the installation got corrupted and wouldn't reload from the original disc. This is a 'life-saver'.
Downloaded and installed without any problems.
Excellent.
This version even works better with the No CD Patch installed than the original!
My thanks to the crew at RELAODED.

    sam2.exe - entry point not found
the procedure entry point RestoreLastError could not be located in the dynamic link library kernel32.dll

... so i downloaded and installed kernel32.dll but still no change. so i re-installed but yet again the same msg.  pls ne1 help?
works great thank you very much:)

Seeding would be a nice thing to do. 

I'm d/ling here at an average of 1kB/sec

Whenever I try to play, it says "Wrong disc inserted. Please insert the correct disc."

I've tried rebooting and I've tried reinstalling, but it's not working.

Help!

Torjan Horse Generic8.WTW. is a false positive people..AVG reports allot of them, so does all the other "known" programs..good for general protection only. If you want complete protection from virus's and malware that even others will not detect then I highly suggest "Malwarebytes"..seriously!!!!
